name: ASOCIACION DE EXPORTADORES
goal:
All our actions are aimed at enhancing Peruvian foreign trade, with a focus on the following strategic objectives:

Contribute to the competitiveness of enterprises.
Promote exports, foreign trade, and investments.
Develop the exportable offer.
Contribute to national development, wellbeing, and employment.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Food Safety, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Contribute on the generation of decentralized and sustainable development of Peruvian exports, promoting innovation, competitiveness, and internationalization of the associated enterprises. Promote with emphasis the generation of value added, the development of skills, and professional business capacities with social and environmental responsibility
